#summary One-sentence summary of this page.

= Introduction =

=== *Classic Tetris* with blue shapes and yellow background. ===


= Controls =

Controls is very simple, all you need is:
  * _Move shape aside_ - slide aside the screen
  * _Quick move shape down_ - slide down the screen
  * _Rotate shape_ - tap the screen

That's all. Have a nice play `^_^`
